title: sEvaDi malar
sahitya:
sEvaDi malar vADa shiriyEnai anbuDan tEDi vanddAyE tiruvaruL ennE


anupallavi

  mUvaDi maN kETTu muzhudum IraDiyAlE tAviDum mAyan magizh tangaiyin shiru maindA


caraNam    tAmaraip-pUvil vaighun-catur mukhan tudi sheidu tan shiram porundavE tAzhndu vaNangum pAdam 
mAmarai paNiyIshan mArbilum tOL mIdilum Om enum poruL kUra uvaghai koNDEriya
